content.rendered:
Directed by Abhishek Sharma.

Written by Anant Singh.

Cast Sonam Kapoor(Zoya Singh Solanki). Dulquer Salmaan(Nikhil Khoda). Sanjay Kapoor(Vijayendra Singh Solanki) . Aasokaa(Monk). Shoaib Ahmed(Dabbu). Aakash Ahuja(Pakistan Bowler). Udit Arora(Ketan). Angad Bedi(Robin). Alistar Bennis(Neelo). Pooja Bhamrrah(Sonali (Reporter) (as Pooja Bhamrah)). Manu Rishi Chadha(Jogpal). Ajoy Chakraborty(BCCI member). Abhilash Chaudhary(Shivi). Cricknowle(Devid). Gandharv Dewan(Harry). Pankaj Dheer(Self). Rishi Hapawat(The Dentist). Saurav Hariyanvi(Hotel Staff). Ibnusta(Ali). Diksha Juneja(Juhi). Shoaib Kabeer(Dabbu). Anil Kapoor(Self).Tanuj Kewalramani.Sarfaraz Khan. Sikandar Kher((as Sikander Kher)). Richard Bhakti Klein(Coach (as R. Bhakti Klein)). Shyam Lal(Driver). Richard John Lovatt(Australian Fast Bowler). Abhishek Madrecha(Zahid). Vikas Mandaliya(Vishal).Paras Mehta. Gavin Methalaka(Ad Film Director (as Gavin N. Methalaka)). Andrew Mottershead(Umpire). Sunilkumar Nair(Siji). Nileshpatelxyz(Ak’s friend). Koel Purie(Monita). Pardeep Singh Rajput(News reporter (as Pradeep Singh Rajput)). Madhurima Roy(Lily). Kiara Sadh(Baby Zoya). Mohd Sharia(Policeman). Saurabh Sharma(News Anchor). Anant Singh(Commentator (voice)). Aashay Srivastava(Nikhil). Sahil Vaid(Commentator Paaji (voice)). Vaibhav Sharma(Ahmad (uncredited))

Language Hindi.

Producers Pooja Shetty Deora. Kalindar Mulani. Anup Poddar. Aarti Shetty. Yogiraj Shetty. Shraddha Singh.

Production Fox STAR Studios.
